metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30528 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in WebAuthentication in Google Chrome on Android prior to91.0.4472.77 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess of a user who had saved a credit card in their Google account topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
